name: Word Island - Anagram - Word Puzzle Game
name_original: Word Island - Anagram - Word Puzzle Game
description:
Word Island - Free Word Puzzle Game, a simple and exciting word puzzle game where you can get a lot of fun of building words. FREE DOWNLOAD, Word Island - Free Word Puzzle Game to become the genius of word . 

With this game you can easily improve your vocabulary, 
concentration and spelling skills. 

The rules are very simple! You get a word with letters mixed (an ANAGRAM). For example "IFT". You need to connect letters and make every word of those letters. "FIT", "IT", "IF". 

We aren't promising it's going to be easy, but you'll have fun, and your brain will thank you for the workout! 
Word Island - Free Word Puzzle Game is suitable for both children and adults. 

* Free
* EASY and FUN playing
* Challenging 
* 1000 levels 
* Unique levels 
* In-game prizes
* No internet connection needed
* Supports Phones and Tablets 
* Beautiful and pleasant
* Available on different languages (English, Turkish).
